messages.subject: Odyssey
messages.msgSnippet: No, wrong guess. I didn t write the Odissey. It s Odyssey. And I m extremely baffled now. You only want your child to love and be fascinated with YOU and
messages.messageBody:
"No, wrong guess. I didn't write the Odissey."

It's Odyssey.

And I'm extremely baffled now. You only want your child to love and
be fascinated with YOU and what you write/sing/make up?
You are needing to let go of a LOT of baggage before joyful
unschooling will ever take place in your home.
I would venture to guess that there are some co-dependent behaviors
in your family. I could be wrong, but much of what you're written
sounds like it's from a place of deep insecurity, negativity and
fear.
Not a good environment for joy, which is the most important
ingredient in unschooling.

Ren
